content: this is a simple and beautiful sock knit from the top down good for any level of sock knitting experience pattern calls for 2 circular needles techniques include knit purl ssk slip slip knit k2tog the herringbone pattern really pops with lighter solid color yarns errata 8/9/2011 for second sock herringbone gansey pattern should read * p1 k3 * repeat to end of round my apologies to anyone who anyone who downloaded the pattern before 8/10/2011 pattern has now been corrected
